Generated Narrative: SistemaDeCodigos cs-problema-ges-tei

Language: es

This case-sensitive code system https://interoperabilidad.minsal.cl/fhir/ig/tei/CodeSystem/cs-problema-ges-tei defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
